verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, See <WH7200>, I have made <WH5414> thee as God <WH430> to Pharaoh <WH6547>; and Aaron <WH175> thy brother <WH251> shall be thy prophet <WH5030>.

Thou shalt speak <WH1696> all that I command <WH6680> thee <WH175>; and Aaron thy brother <WH251> shall speak <WH1696> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, that he let <WH7971> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> go out of his land <WH776>.
And I will harden <WH7185> Pharaoh <WH6547>'s heart <WH3820>, and multiply <WH7235> my signs <WH226> and my wonders <WH4159> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

But Pharaoh <WH6547> will not hearken <WH8085> unto you <WH5414>, and I will lay my hand <WH3027> upon Egypt <WH4714>, and bring forth <WH3318> my hosts <WH6635>, my people <WH5971> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> by great <WH1419> judgments <WH8201>.

And the Egyptians <WH4714> shall know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068>, when I stretch forth <WH5186> my hand <WH3027> upon Egypt <WH4714>, and bring out <WH3318> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from among them <WH8432>.
And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> did <WH6213> so <WH3068>; as Jehovah commanded <WH6680> them <WH6213>, so did they.

And Moses <WH4872> was fourscore <WH8084> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>, and Aaron <WH175> fourscore <WH8084> and three <WH7969> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>, when they spake <WH1696> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872> and unto Aaron <WH175>, saying <WH559>,

When Pharaoh <WH6547> shall speak <WH1696> unto you <WH559>, saying, Show <WH5414> a wonder <WH4159> for you <WH559>; then thou shalt say unto Aaron <WH175>, Take <WH3947> thy rod <WH4294>, and cast <WH7993> it down before <WH6440> Pharaoh <WH6547>, that it become a serpent <WH8577>.

And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> went in <WH935> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, and they did <WH6213> so <WH3068>, as Jehovah had commanded <WH6680>: and Aaron <WH175> cast down <WH7993> his rod <WH4294> before <WH6440> Pharaoh <WH6547> and before <WH6440> his servants <WH5650>, and it became a serpent <WH8577>.

Then Pharaoh <WH6547> also called <WH7121> for the wise men <WH2450> and the sorcerers <WH3784>: and they also <WH2748>, the magicians of Egypt <WH4714>, did <WH6213> in like manner <WH3651> with their enchantments <WH3858>.
For they cast down <WH7993> every man <WH376> his rod <WH4294>, and they became serpents <WH8577>: but Aaron <WH175>'s rod <WH4294> swallowed up <WH1104> their rods <WH4294>.
And Pharaoh <WH6547>'s heart <WH3820> was hardened <WH2388>, and he hearkened <WH8085> not unto them <WH3068>; as Jehovah had spoken <WH1696>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Pharaoh <WH6547>'s heart <WH3820> is stubborn <WH3515>, he refuseth <WH3985> to let the people <WH5971> go <WH7971>.

Get <WH3212> thee unto Pharaoh <WH6547> in the morning <WH1242>; lo <WH3318>, he goeth out unto the water <WH4325>; and thou shalt stand <WH5324> by the river <WH2975>'s brink <WH8193> to meet <WH7125> him <WH4294>; and the rod which was turned <WH2015> to a serpent <WH5175> shalt thou take <WH3947> in thy hand <WH3027>.

And thou shalt say <WH559> unto him <WH3068>, Jehovah, the God <WH430> of the Hebrews <WH5680>, hath sent <WH7971> me unto thee <WH559>, saying, Let my people <WH5971> go <WH7971>, that they may serve <WH5647> me in the wilderness <WH4057>: and <WH3541>, behold, hitherto thou hast not hearkened <WH8085>.

Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>, In this thou shalt know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068>: behold <WH5221>, I will smite with the rod <WH4294> that is in my hand <WH3027> upon the waters <WH4325> which are in the river <WH2975>, and they shall be turned <WH2015> to blood <WH1818>.

And the fish <WH1710> that are in the river <WH2975> shall die <WH4191>, and the river <WH2975> shall become foul <WH887>; and the Egyptians <WH4714> shall loathe <WH3811> to drink <WH8354> water <WH4325> from the river <WH2975>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Say unto Aaron <WH175>, Take <WH3947> thy rod <WH4294>, and stretch out <WH5186> thy hand <WH3027> over the waters <WH4325> of Egypt <WH4714>, over their rivers <WH2975>, over their streams <WH5104>, and over their pools <WH4723>, and over all their ponds <WH98> of water <WH4325>, that they may become blood <WH1818>; and there shall be blood <WH1818> throughout all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, both in vessels of wood <WH6086> and in vessels of stone <WH68>.

And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> did <WH6213> so <WH3068>, as Jehovah commanded <WH6680>; and he lifted up <WH7311> the rod <WH4294>, and smote <WH5221> the waters <WH4325> that were in the river <WH2975>, in the sight <WH5869> of Pharaoh <WH6547>, and in the sight <WH5869> of his servants <WH5650>; and all the waters <WH4325> that were in the river <WH2975> were turned <WH2015> to blood <WH1818>.

And the fish <WH1710> that were in the river <WH2975> died <WH4191>; and the river <WH2975> became foul <WH887>, and the Egyptians <WH4714> could <WH3201> not drink <WH8354> water <WH4325> from the river <WH2975>; and the blood <WH1818> was throughout all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And the magicians <WH2748> of Egypt <WH4714> did <WH6213> in like manner with their enchantments <WH3909>: and Pharaoh <WH6547>'s heart <WH3820> was hardened <WH2388>, and he hearkened <WH8085> not unto them <WH3068>; as Jehovah had spoken <WH1696>.
And Pharaoh <WH6547> turned <WH6437> and went <WH935> into his house <WH1004>, neither did he lay <WH7896> even this <WH2063> to heart <WH3820>.

And all the Egyptians <WH4714> digged <WH2658> round about <WH5439> the river <WH2975> for water <WH4325> to drink <WH8354>; for they could <WH3201> not drink <WH8354> of the water <WH4325> of the river <WH2975>.
And seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> were fulfilled <WH4390>, after <WH310> that Jehovah <WH3068> had smitten <WH5221> the river <WH2975>.
